snippet: Apps that let users find friends whenever they are nearby are to be on display at the South by Southwest technology, music and film conference.
abstract: Smartphone apps that help users find friends whenever they are nearby will be featured at the South by Southwest technology, music and film conference in Austin, Tex; most of these services are dependent on Facebook; app developers are seeking attention from technology enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and venture capitalists who attend show to see the latest in start-ups and innovative ideas.
lead_paragraph: Apps that let users find friends whenever they are nearby are to be on display at the South by Southwest technology, music and film conference.

headline.seo: New Apps Connect to Friends Nearby
